dissthispkgr 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Summarize data frame with target summary statistics

    summarize_diss.Rd

    summarize_diss takes a data frame to summarize data in a concise format. The output closely resembles skimr::skim(), but with all the unnecessary information removed.

    summarize_diss(data, summary_vars, summary_stats)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame to summarize.

    summary_vars

    A set of columns of interest.

    summary_stats

    A set of summary statistics of interest.

    Value

    Summarized object with groups intact.

    Examples

    library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(purrr)
mtcars %>%
 group_by(cyl, gear) %>%
 summarize_diss(c("mpg", "disp"), c("mean", "sd", "median", "min", "max"))
#> # A tibble: 16 × 8
#> # Groups:   cyl, gear [8]
#>      cyl  gear variable  mean     sd median   min   max
#>    <dbl> <dbl> <chr>    <dbl>  <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1     4     3 mpg       21.5 NA       21.5  21.5  21.5
#>  2     4     3 disp     120.  NA      120.  120.  120. 
#>  3     4     4 mpg       26.9  4.81    25.8  21.4  33.9
#>  4     4     4 disp     103.  30.7     93.5  71.1 147. 
#>  5     4     5 mpg       28.2  3.11    28.2  26    30.4
#>  6     4     5 disp     108.  17.8    108.   95.1 120. 
#>  7     6     3 mpg       19.8  2.33    19.8  18.1  21.4
#>  8     6     3 disp     242.  23.3    242.  225   258  
#>  9     6     4 mpg       19.8  1.55    20.1  17.8  21  
#> 10     6     4 disp     164.   4.39   164.  160   168. 
#> 11     6     5 mpg       19.7 NA       19.7  19.7  19.7
#> 12     6     5 disp     145   NA      145   145   145  
#> 13     8     3 mpg       15.0  2.77    15.2  10.4  19.2
#> 14     8     3 disp     358.  71.8    355   276.  472  
#> 15     8     5 mpg       15.4  0.566   15.4  15    15.8
#> 16     8     5 disp     326   35.4    326   301   351
